text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN Trump, Every time you type ridiculous comments on Twitter, you are showing the world you are Mentally Incompetent & should never have been placed in the White House! You are a Failure & your mismanagement of the Coronavirus is causing millions to become ill & thousands to die! https://t.co/65NlXqNYRH
